info.title: Quality Governance Platform
info.description: Enterprise-grade Quality Governance (IMS) Platform for ISO compliance management

post.description: Authenticate user and return access and refresh tokens.
Refresh access token using refresh token.

get.description: Get current authenticated user information.

post.description: Change current user's password.

schema.title: Response Change Password Api V1 Auth Change Password Post

get.description: List all users with pagination and filtering.

post.description: Create a new user (superuser only).

get.description: Get a specific user by ID.
List all roles.

schema.title: Response List Roles Api V1 Users Roles  Get

post.description: Create a new role (superuser only).

get.description: List all standards with pagination.

post.description: Create a new standard (superuser only).

get.description: Get a specific standard with its clauses.
List clauses for a standard.

schema.title: Response List Clauses Api V1 Standards  Standard Id  Clauses Get

post.description: Create a new clause for a standard (superuser only).

get.description: Get a specific clause.

post.description: Create a new control for a clause (superuser only).

get.description: Get a specific control.
List all audit templates with pagination and filtering.

post.description: Create a new audit template.

get.description: Get a specific audit template with sections and questions.

delete.description: Soft delete an audit template (superuser only).

post.description: Publish an audit template, making it available for use.
Clone an existing audit template.
Create a new section in an audit template.
Create a new question in an audit template.

get.description: List all audit runs with pagination and filtering.

post.description: Create a new audit run from a template.

get.description: Get a specific audit run with responses and findings.

post.description: Start an audit run.
Complete an audit run and calculate scores.
Submit a response to an audit question.

get.description: List all audit findings with pagination and filtering.

post.description: Create a new finding for an audit run.

get.description: List all risks with pagination and filtering.

post.description: Create a new risk.

get.description: Get risk register statistics.
Get the risk matrix with risk counts per cell.
Get a specific risk with controls and assessments.

post.description: Create a new control for a risk.

get.description: List all controls for a risk.

schema.title: Response List Controls Api V1 Risks  Risk Id  Controls Get

post.description: Create a new assessment for a risk.

get.description: List all assessments for a risk (history).

schema.title: Response List Assessments Api V1 Risks  Risk Id  Assessments Get

post.description:
Report a new incident.

Requires authentication.

get.description:
List all incidents with deterministic ordering.

Incidents are ordered by:
1. reported_date DESC (newest first)
2. id ASC (stable secondary sort)

Requires authentication.

Get an incident by ID.

Requires authentication.

patch.description:
Partially update an incident.

Requires authentication.

get.description:
List investigations for a specific incident.

Requires authentication.
Returns investigations assigned to this incident.

schema.title: Response List Incident Investigations Api V1 Incidents  Incident Id  Investigations Get

get.description: List all road traffic collisions.

schema.title: Response List Rta Api V1 Rta Get

get.description: List all RTA actions.

schema.title: Response List Rta Actions Api V1 Rta Actions Get

post.description:
Create a new investigation template.

Requires authentication and appropriate permissions.

get.description:
List investigation templates with pagination.

Returns templates in deterministic order (by ID).
Get a specific investigation template by ID.

patch.description:
Update an investigation template.

Only provided fields will be updated (partial update).

delete.description:
Delete an investigation template.

Only safe if no investigation runs reference this template.

post.description:
Create a new investigation run.

Requires authentication and validates that:
- Template exists
- Assigned entity type is valid
- Assigned entity exists

Returns 400 for invalid entity type, 404 for missing template or entity.

get.description:
List investigation runs with pagination.

Returns investigations in deterministic order (created_at DESC, id ASC).
Can filter by entity_type, entity_id, and status.
Get a specific investigation run by ID.

patch.description:
Update an investigation run.

Only provided fields will be updated (partial update).
Can update RCA section fields via the data field.

post.description:
Create a new complaint.

Requires authentication.

get.description:
List all complaints with deterministic ordering.

Ordering: received_date DESC, id ASC
Requires authentication.

Get a complaint by ID.

Requires authentication.

patch.description:
Partial update of a complaint.

Requires authentication.

post.description:
Create a new policy document.

Requires authentication.

get.description:
List all policies with deterministic ordering.

Policies are ordered by:
1. reference_number DESC (newest first)
2. id ASC (stable secondary sort)

Requires authentication.

Get a specific policy by ID.

Requires authentication.

put.description:
Update an existing policy.

Requires authentication.

get.description: Root endpoint: Provides basic API information and links.
Health check endpoint.

Liveness probe: Check if application process is alive.

Returns 200 OK if the application is running.
Used by container orchestrators to determine if the container should be restarted.

Readiness probe: Check if application is ready to accept traffic.

Checks database connectivity. Returns 200 OK if ready, 503 if not ready.
Used by load balancers to determine if traffic should be routed to this instance.

Per ADR-0003: Readiness Probe Database Check
